DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVES : The aim study evaluate clinical response non-ablative radiofrequency ( RF ) outcome cosmetic female external genital effect sexual function . METHODS : Single blind randomize controlled trial . Sample 43 woman ( 29 sexual active ) insatisfaction appearance external genitalia , 21 ( 14 ) study group 22 ( 15 ) control group . The protocol consist 8 session RF week . The instrument evaluation photo ( take first session eight day last session ) , evaluate patient three health professional ( know group ) ; 3 point Likert scale ( unsatisfied , unchanged , satisfied ) ( bad , unchanged , improve ) . The sexual function evaluate Female Sexual Function Index ( FSFI ) , analyze T Test Student . The patient ' satisfaction health professional ' evaluation analyze chi-squared test binomial comparison inter-group intra-group .
DOC.brief_title: Radiofrequency Female External Genital Region : Clinical Trial
DOC.criteria: included woman age 18 60 year unsatisfied appearance external genital , attend clinical physiotherapy , Bahia , Brazil Pregnant woman , woman use copper IUD , well skin lesion genital region exclude trial .
DOC.keyword: Treatment Pulsed Radio Frequency , Collagen , Female
